data.title: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier Collection II
data.meta_description:
The adventure of you and Yuko is not over yet. The second revival of the legendary beautiful girl action game!

A sequel to "Mugen Senshi Valis COLLECTION" is here. In this work, in addition to the three titles "Valis IV (PC Engine)", "SD Valis (Mega Drive)", and "Mugen Senshi Valis (Mega Drive)" that many people want to reprint, the PC version (which is the origin of the Valis series) "Mugen Senshi Valis" is included. This is a must-have not only for Valis fans, but also for retro game fans.

The popular series "Mugen Senshi Valis", supported by many enthusiastic fans, is a side-scrolling action game released as a PC game in 1986. The unique world view of high school girls in sailor uniforms and bikini armor fighting monsters, and the solid action and storyline captured the hearts of many game fans, and many sequels were produced and ported to other models. Even now, more than 35 years after its release, it is a title that has many enthusiastic fans both in Japan and overseas.
